### Changed
- Expose `isManagementCluster` value in the `ClusterPicker` scaffolder field.
- Improve `formatTemplateString` utility to support `clusterNamePrefix` placeholders.
See [./docs/releases/v0.93.2-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.93.2-changelog.md) for more information.
